mapper.sql: vendor, type, version,swversion, datatype, pmname, grade, excetype, excereasion
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from udp_exemp_data where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((vendor= #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version= #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or (vendor= #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version= 'ALL') or vendor= 'ALL')
mapper.insert:
insert into udp_exemp_data
vendor,
type,
version,
swversion,
datatype,
pmname,
grade,
excetype,
excereasion,
